name: Zempus 3491
description:
Zempus 3491

Space shooter from 3 different angles. Works on Windows, Mac and Linux.

Controls

Keyboard

wasd or arrow keys -> Movement

ctrl or left mouse button -> Shoot forward

alt or right mouse button -> Shoot backwards

360 Controller (Windows)

D pad or Left stick -> Movement

A button -> Shoot forwards

B - Button -> Shoot backwards
